languages.text: "Произошедшее было омрачено тем, что в высоких кругах заговорили... преступно даже произносить такую ересь при вас, Ваша Светлость..." {n}Губернатор запинается и набирает в легкие побольше воздуха.{/n} "Были те, кто требовал поставить во главе рода истинного наследника Теодоры... Кунрада Войгтвира. Его деяния на благо торгового протектората были забыты не всеми вашими подданными". {n}Урбенд замолкает и напряженно вглядывается в ваше лицо.{/n} "Когда началось расследование... нити доказательств привели к Версерианам".

traits.locale_text: "В конце концов нам удалось погасить восстания, к сожалению, не без помощи извне. Произошедшее было омрачено тем, что чернь требовала... преступно даже произносить такую ересь при вас, Ваша Светлость..." {n}Губернатор запинается и набирает в легкие побольше воздуха.{/n} "Чернь требовала короновать — по словам убогого сброда — истинного наследника Теодоры... Кунрада Войгтвира. Заверяю вас, что эти еретические мысли были подавлены". {n}Урбенд замолкает и напряженно вглядывается в ваше лицо.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "These events have also been overshadowed by the... I am ashamed to even say it aloud in front of you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "Some were calling for Theodora's true heir to be installed as head of your house... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his past efforts for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Drivestem stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation was launched... the evidence led us to the Werserians."
languages.original_text: "Произошедшее было омрачено тем, что в высоких кругах заговорили... преступно даже произносить такую ересь при вас, Ваша Светлость..." {n}Губернатор запинается и набирает в легкие побольше воздуха.{/n} "Были те, кто требовал поставить во главе рода истинного наследника Теодоры... Кунрада Войгтвира. Его деяния на благо торгового протектората были забыты не всеми вашими подданными". {n}Урбенд замолкает и напряженно вглядывается в ваше лицо.{/n} "Когда началось расследование... нити доказательств привели к Версерианам".

traits.locale_text: "That what happened has also been blighted by the... I am ashamed to even say it out loud in front of you, Your mf|Lordship Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The Governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "There were those who demanded the true heir of Theodora be placed at the helm... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his actions for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Urbend stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation had started... the evidence led us to the Werserians."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「これらの出来事もまた見劣りするほどの…御前で申し上げるのもお恥ずかしい話です…噂が上級貴族家にも広まり…」{n}総督は口ごもり、深呼吸をする。{/n}「シオドーラの真の後継者…クンラッド・ボイトヴィルを貴家の当主に据えるべきだという意見もあったのです。陛下の家臣全員が、保護領での貿易の利益を考えてクンラッドの過去の努力を忘れているわけではありませんが…」{n}ドライブステムは話を中断して、緊張した面持ちであなたを見る。{/n}「調査を開始したところ…ウェルザリアン家を示唆する証拠があがったのです」
languages.original_text: "These events have also been overshadowed by the... I am ashamed to even say it aloud in front of you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "Some were calling for Theodora's true heir to be installed as head of your house... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his past efforts for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Drivestem stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation was launched... the evidence led us to the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: 「これらの出来事もまた見劣りするほどの…御前で申し上げるのもお恥ずかしい話です…噂が上級貴族家にも広まり…」{n}総督は口ごもり、深呼吸をする。{/n}「シオドーラの真の後継者…クンラッド・ボイトヴィルを貴家の当主に据えるべきだという意見もあったのです。陛下の家臣全員が、保護領での貿易の利益を考えてクンラッドの過去の努力を忘れているわけではありませんが…」{n}ドライブステムは話を中断して、緊張した面持ちであなたを見る。{/n}「調査を開始したところ…ウェルザリアン家を示唆する証拠があがったのです」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “这些事情其实是受到了某些谣言的影响……大人，我实在羞于在您面前提起这件事……但这是在上流贵族间广泛流传的谣言……”{n}德莱夫斯塔欲言又止，然后深吸一口气。{/n}“有些人提出，要让西奥多拉所谓‘真正的继承人’……昆拉德·维特威尔，成为王朝的统治者。您的许多臣民都还记得昆拉德曾为捍卫贸易王朝的福祉所做的一切努力。”{n}德莱夫斯塔停下话头，有些紧张地看着你。{/n}“在经过一番调查后，证据指向了……韦尔森家族。”
languages.original_text: "These events have also been overshadowed by the... I am ashamed to even say it aloud in front of you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "Some were calling for Theodora's true heir to be installed as head of your house... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his past efforts for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Drivestem stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation was launched... the evidence led us to the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: “这些事情其实是受到了某些谣言的影响……大人，我实在羞于在您面前提起这件事……但这是在上流贵族间广泛流传的谣言……”{n}德莱夫斯塔欲言又止，然后深吸一口气。{/n}“有些人提出，要让西奥多拉所谓‘真正的继承人’……昆拉德·维特威尔，成为王朝的统治者。您的许多臣民都还记得昆拉德曾为捍卫贸易王朝的福祉所做的一切努力。”{n}德莱夫斯塔停下话头，有些紧张地看着你。{/n}“在经过一番调查后，证据指向了……韦尔森家族。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Ces événements ont également été envenimés par les... j'ai presque honte de vous le dire en face, Votre Seigneurie... par les rumeurs qui circulent dans les maisons de haut rang... » {n}Le gouverneur balbutie quelques propos incompréhensibles avant de prendre une grande inspiration.{/n} « Certains ont plaidé pour que le véritable héritier de Théodora soit nommé à la tête de votre maison... Kunrad Voigtvir. Sa contribution au protectorat commercial semble lui avoir permis de gagner la faveur de certains de vos sujets. » {n}Drivestem s'interrompt et vous dévisage, l'air tendu.{/n} « L'enquête... nous a menés tout droit aux Werserian. »
languages.original_text: "These events have also been overshadowed by the... I am ashamed to even say it aloud in front of you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "Some were calling for Theodora's true heir to be installed as head of your house... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his past efforts for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Drivestem stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation was launched... the evidence led us to the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: « Ces événements ont également été envenimés par les... j'ai presque honte de vous le dire en face, Votre Seigneurie... par les rumeurs qui circulent dans les maisons de haut rang... » {n}Le gouverneur balbutie quelques propos incompréhensibles avant de prendre une grande inspiration.{/n} « Certains ont plaidé pour que le véritable héritier de Théodora soit nommé à la tête de votre maison... Kunrad Voigtvir. Sa contribution au protectorat commercial semble lui avoir permis de gagner la faveur de certains de vos sujets. » {n}Drivestem s'interrompt et vous dévisage, l'air tendu.{/n} « L'enquête... nous a menés tout droit aux Werserian. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Los acontecimientos, además, se han visto enturbiados por... me da apuro decirlo en voz alta delante de usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}... los rumores que circulan entre las altas casas...». {n}El gobernador balbucea y respira hondo.{/n} «Había quienes exigían que se restituyera el liderazgo de la casa al verdadero heredero de Theodora... Kunrad Voigtvir. Algunos de sus súbditos aún recuerdan su labor a favor del protectorado comercial». {n}Drivestem deja de hablar y te mira tenso.{/n} «Cuando se inició la investigación, las pruebas nos llevaron hasta los Werserian».
languages.original_text: "These events have also been overshadowed by the... I am ashamed to even say it aloud in front of you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "Some were calling for Theodora's true heir to be installed as head of your house... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his past efforts for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Drivestem stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation was launched... the evidence led us to the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: «Los acontecimientos, además, se han visto enturbiados por... me da apuro decirlo en voz alta delante de usted, mi{mf|lord|lady}... los rumores que circulan entre las altas casas...». {n}El gobernador balbucea y respira hondo.{/n} «Había quienes exigían que se restituyera el liderazgo de la casa al verdadero heredero de Theodora... Kunrad Voigtvir. Algunos de sus súbditos aún recuerdan su labor a favor del protectorado comercial». {n}Drivestem deja de hablar y te mira tenso.{/n} «Cuando se inició la investigación, las pruebas nos llevaron hasta los Werserian».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Diese Ereignisse wurden überdies überschattet von ... Ich schäme mich, es vor Euch überhaupt laut auszusprechen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... den Gerüchten, die unter den höheren Häusern kursieren ..." {n}Der Gouverneur gerät ins Stottern und atmet schließlich tief durch.{/n} "Einige forderten die Einsetzung von Theodoras wahrem Erben als Oberhaupt Eures Hauses ... Kunrad Voigtvir. Nicht alle Eure Untertanen haben seine vergangenen Bemühungen zum Wohle des Handelsprotektorats vergessen." {n}Drivestem verstummt und beobachtet dich angespannt.{/n} "Als die Untersuchung begann ... führten uns die Beweise zu den Werserians."
languages.original_text: "These events have also been overshadowed by the... I am ashamed to even say it aloud in front of you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "Some were calling for Theodora's true heir to be installed as head of your house... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his past efforts for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Drivestem stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation was launched... the evidence led us to the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: "Über allem lag auch noch der Schatten der ... ich schäme mich, es vor Euch überhaupt laut auszusprechen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... der Gerüchte, die unter den höheren Häusern die Runde machten ..." {n}Der Gouverneur gerät ins Stammeln und atmet dann tief durch.{/n} "Einige haben gefordert, dass Theodoras wahrer Erbe den Thron übernehmen sollte ... Kunrad Voigtvir. Nicht alle Eure Untertanen haben seine Taten zum Wohle des Handelsprotektorats vergessen." {n}Urbend verstummt und beobachtet dich angespannt.{/n} "Als die Untersuchung begonnen wurde ... haben uns die Beweise zu den Werserians geführt."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Üstelik bu olaylar, başka bir hadisenin gölgesinde kaldı... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, huzurunuzda bunu izah etmekten dahi utanıyorum... Üst mertebe soyluların dilinde öyle söylentiler dolaşıyor ki..." {n}Vali duraksıyor, ardından derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Bazı kimseler, Theodora'nın sahih vârisini... Kunrad Voigtvir'i hanenizin başı olmaya layık görüyor. Tebaanız arasında, kendisinin ticaret protektorasına fayda sağlayan eylemlerini unutmayanlar da var." {n}Konuşmaya ara veren Drivestem, gergin bir ifadeyle seni izliyor.{/n} "Soruşturmanın sonucunda elde edilen kanıt... Werserianların aleyhine oldu."
languages.original_text: "These events have also been overshadowed by the... I am ashamed to even say it aloud in front of you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... the rumours circulating among the higher houses..." {n}The governor stammers, then takes a deep breath.{/n} "Some were calling for Theodora's true heir to be installed as head of your house... Kunrad Voigtvir. Not all of your subjects have forgotten his past efforts for the benefit of the trade protectorate." {n}Drivestem stops talking, watching you with a tense expression.{/n} "When the investigation was launched... the evidence led us to the Werserians."

traits.locale_text: "Üstelik bu olaylar, başka bir hadisenin gölgesinde kaldı... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, huzurunuzda bunu izah etmekten dahi utanıyorum... Üst mertebe soyluların dilinde öyle söylentiler dolaşıyor ki..." {n}Vali duraksıyor, ardından derin bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Bazı kimseler Theodora'nın sahih vârisini... Kunrad Voigtvir'i hanenizin başına layık görüyorlar. Tebaanızda kendisinin ticaret protektorasına fayda sağlayan eylemlerini unutmayanlar da var." {n}Konuşmasına ara veren Drivestem, gergin bir ifadeyle seni izliyor.{/n} "Soruşturmanın sonucunda elde edilen kanıt... Werserian hanesinin aleyhine oldu."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
